TextLibrary.Text: Flicker
Kelthurax
WHO DISTURBS MY SLEEP?
WHO DISTURBS MY SLEEP?
WHO DISTURBS MY SLEEP?
WHO DISTURBS MY SLEEP?
Sorry... Lord... I... We... need your help. It is important.
Sorry... Lord... I... We... need your help. It is important.
Sorry... Lord... I... We... need your help. It is important.
Sorry... Lord... I... We... need your help. It is important.
AND WHO ARE YOU?
AND WHO ARE YOU?
AND WHO ARE YOU?
AND WHO ARE YOU?
My name is Flicker, Lord Kelthurax.
My name is Flicker, Lord Kelthurax.
My name is Flicker, Lord Kelthurax.
My name is Flicker, Lord Kelthurax.
AND WHY SHOULD I NOT JUST EAT YOU AND GO BACK TO SLEEP?
AND WHY SHOULD I NOT JUST EAT YOU AND GO BACK TO SLEEP?
AND WHY SHOULD I NOT JUST EAT YOU AND GO BACK TO SLEEP?
AND WHY SHOULD I NOT JUST EAT YOU AND GO BACK TO SLEEP?
Because I am the last Dragon left here, Lord. The others are gone.
Because I am the last Dragon left here, Lord. The others are gone.
Because I am the last Dragon left here, Lord. The others are gone.
Because I am the last Dragon left here, Lord. The others are gone.
GONE? THEN YOU SHOULD JOIN THEM. NOW LEAVE ME ALONE.
GONE? THEN YOU SHOULD JOIN THEM. NOW LEAVE ME ALONE.
GONE? THEN YOU SHOULD JOIN THEM. NOW LEAVE ME ALONE.
GONE? THEN YOU SHOULD JOIN THEM. NOW LEAVE ME ALONE.
